attributes.action: More GP appointments and better NHS
attributes.additional_details: Some people are waiting for appointment for more than 3 weeks, even when you tell them you're in pain, it doesn't matter. 90% of people can't afford to go to private doctors
attributes.background: Getting an appointment at the gp became a nightmare since covid pandemic, you ring at 8am after being in the queue for 20 min they tell you there is no more appointments and ask you to ring back at 1pm, and at 1pm they will ask you to ring again the next day .....

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do, or you might like to sign and share this petition

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/587701
